creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: panel with yellow, green, grey, red and purple fringe and trim; yellow, pink, orange, red and cream on one side with blue ikat-motif designs in stripes; shades of red and purple on back
dimension: 71 x 32 1/4 in. (180.34 x 81.92 cm) (without trim or fringe)
medium: Cotton, silk; weft resist dye (jaspe) ikat
title: Rebozo
